meanings.definition: Flavanols: a group of chemical compounds found in various plants, especially in cocoa, tea, and certain fruits
meanings.sent1: The flavanols in cocoa give it a rich flavor.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy eating fruits that contain flavanols.
meanings.sent3: The tea was so full of flavanols, it felt like a garden in a cup.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of plants was as deep as the roots of flavanols.
meanings.sent5: The scent of cocoa filled the air, carrying with it the essence of flavanols.

meanings.definition: Flavanols: antioxidants that may have potential health benefits, such as improving heart health and reducing inflammation
meanings.sent1: Eating foods rich in flavanols can help keep your heart healthy.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend consuming flavanols to reduce inflammation in the body.
meanings.sent3: The flavanols in the smoothie were like tiny superheroes fighting off inflammation.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt lighter, as if infused with the power of flavanols.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of flavanols on health were evident in her glowing skin.
